title: Milestones & Mentions - Alabatoso Orbital
heading: Milestones & Kofɔlenw
description: Nin san caman seko ni dɔnko baara in ye Mercosul Bienal 13nan dɔ ye Porto Alegre, Berezil jamana na, Marcelo Dantas de ye min ɲɛnabɔ. A ye 'sèn jan Sɔrɔ Lumen Jara 2022 - Futures Jara la. A ye se sɔrɔ fana ArtSat Category la CubeDesign 2021 ɲɛɲini na, min lawulila Berezil ka sanfɛla ɲinini baarada fɛ (INPE).
